programme.title: Way to Health M Ep331
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Way to Health M Ep332
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Top Singers T Ep651
programme.desc: The show Top Singers aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz M Ep1004
programme.desc: Every second counts in Show Biz to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Dear Mom M Ep36
programme.desc: FengYi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, ShuAn, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. YiWan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. QingQing may be having an affair with a married man. XiaoXi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of the others. AnQing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When FengYi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize theyve neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, Luk uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: Soul Mate
programme.desc: July and An Sheng have been best friends since they were thirteen. They always believed their friendship would last forever, until they meet Su Jia Ming at the age of eighteen. The trio find themselves in a love triangle, which puts the girls friendship to the test and alters their destinies.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriends wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, Tiger Wong is ambushed after he unwittingly took the Lousha Plaque but is saved by his brother Dragon Wong. They also befriended Turbo Shek during the fight and the trio forms a brotherhood. To avenge the death of the Dragon Gate masters, they train and vow to defeat Shibumi, the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, The Eagle Shooting Heroes is loosely based on Louis Chas classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hungs action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: In Broad Daylight
programme.desc: Based on a true event of a news investigative unit receiving a tip-off about the abuse of residents in an Elderly and Disabled Care Home. To expose the homes wrongdoings, reporter Kay goes undercover to expose the inhumanity and unveil the cruel truth under broad daylight.

programme.title: Dust to Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: Return of the One-armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the sick people of Asia and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends help.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughter's lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sings wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the mens help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium houses owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponents son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chans elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: The Spirit of the Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: The Imperial Swordsman
programme.desc: Fu is a government officer heading home after being charged with falsifying reports. En route, he encounters & recruits a skilled swordsman as a bodyguard. They then meet a fleeing bride and her maid who asked to join them for protection. When the group reach a ruined temple however, a gang of assassins appear and attack them

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, who was also his fathers martial arts teacher. Although he is defeated in a competition, Wong Fei Hungs passion in Kung Fu finally moves Lu and allows him to become Lus disciple.

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: A young guy Wu, heads off to the Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend Lian Chu, who was promised to be his bride. When he arrives, he finds out that the family of his bride may not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family

programme.title: THE AMOROUS LOTUS PAN
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Young Vagabond
programme.desc: One of the great Kung-fu film characters is Beggar Su, a legendary Ching Dynasty figure who was also a member of the famous Ten Kwangtung Tigers. Little-known director Liu Shih-yu uses the best Kung-fu actors Shaw Studios had to offer to tell a rare, colorful, action-packed adventure, as Beggar Su and his brother train incessantly to defeat the brutally powerful thief called Centipede. The result is not only reminiscent of preeminent director Liu Chia-liangs work, but essentially an image to him as well.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professors assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: The story happens in a martial arts world where everyone tries to obtain the "Deer Sword". Lian's wife is wounded in an ambush and his rival Xiao saves her. They escape to Xiaos home and he treats her poisonous wound. This leads Lian to suspect his wifes faithfulness and results in several blood-splattering duels with Xiao.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep5
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father passes away, four grown siblings (Jason Bateman, Tina Fey, Adam Driver, Corey Stoll), bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week, along with their over-sharing mother (Jane Fonda) and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens. Confronting their history and the frayed states of their relationships among the people who know and love them best, they ultimately reconnect in hysterical and emotionally affecting ways amid the chaos, humor, heartache and redemption that only families can provide-- driving us insane even as they remind us of our truest, and often best, selves. Comedy director Shawn Levy (Date Night)helms the hilarious script by Jonathan Tropper based on his own best-selling novel.

programme.title: Ninja Assassin
programme.desc: A secret oriental clan trains an orphan child as a killer expert in martial arts. When he grows up, he runs away and becomes the target of the organization, which also spies on an agent who looks into political crimes in Berlin. In order to live, they must both hide. And fight.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S3 Ep7

programme.title: Next Level Chef S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Don't Have A Cow, Man - The remaining chefs butcher and break down various cuts of beef amongst their teams to create sizzling steak dishes; two contestants face elimination as they enter a heated seafood cook-off.

programme.title: The Good Fight S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Day 492 - Season two finale. The FBI question Diane as part of a job background check on Kurt, leading to unexpected and serious consequences. The mayor of Chicago invites Adrian and Julius to join a 'think tank' tasked with figuring out how to spend funds.

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep1
programme.desc: The One About The Recent Troubles - A storm is brewing at Reddick, Boseman & Lockhart when revelations of past indiscretions involving a partner come to light.Right when she thought the world couldnt get any crazier, an incident at home pushes Diane to her breaking point.

programme.title: The Good Fight S3 Ep2
programme.desc: The One Inspired By Roy Cohn - Corruption incarnate enters the courtroom in the form of attorney Roland Blum (Michael Sheen), Maias new co-counsel on a murder trial. The firm interviews a potential new head of matrimonial law, but Lucca is skeptical of his qualifications.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S26 Ep6
programme.desc: Roschach - Agent Clay consults with Benson when a woman is found gravely injured at a remote campground and the suspect could be anywhere along the Eastern Seaboard; Bruno and Silva take a chance on an odd hunch to see if it becomes a lead.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S26 Ep7
programme.desc: Tenfold - Bruno must get to the center of a victims incomplete story to track down a serial rapist. Carisi is helpless to stop a crime he suspects is about to be committed.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S26 Ep8
programme.desc: Cornered - Carisi tries to protect two women taken hostage in a tense standoff between police and a violent thief. Benson and Rollins devise a risky plan to get everyone to safety.

programme.title: Pretty Cheaters, Deadly Lies
programme.desc: After being tricked into a compromising situation, high school senior Hannah Fletcher thinks she can stop her cousin Madisons blackmail by taking her college entrance exam for her. But nothing is enough for Madison, and her plans soon become deadly

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. Ep2
programme.desc: The second six Masked Dancers take to the stage to perform before the virtual audience and the panel - Squirrel vs Carwash, Flamingo vs Rubber Chicken and Frog vs Beagle.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. Ep3
programme.desc: Five of the secret celebrities return to the stage as they produce sensational new dance routines and continue to baffle the panel. Two of them will then compete in a dramatic Dance Off.

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep1
programme.desc: The Beginning Of The End - After being promoted to top partner at the firm, Liz is forced to accept Ri'Chard Lane as a new name partner brought on to help manage her staff and client load. Meanwhile, Diane experiences dj vu.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep2
programme.desc: The End Of The Yips - As Diane encounters her first "therapy" session, she begins to see everything in a positive light.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep3
programme.desc: The End Of Football - Ri'Chard and Liz team up to work on a case about racial discrimination between a Black coach and an NFL team owner; Ben-Baruch returns and stirs up friction with Carmen.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep4
programme.desc: The End Of Eli Gold - Eli Gold's trial is underway, with Marissa Gold as part of his legal team. Liz and Ri'chard attempt to solidify their working relationships leading to a surprise discovery about Ri'chard's history and Liz's father.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep5
programme.desc: The End Of Ginni - Liz gets a strange phone call. Marissa is informed by the FBI that she may be in danger. Ri'Chard asks for Diane's help in a case involving Elsbeth Tascioni.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep6
programme.desc: The End Of A Saturday - The team gathers on Saturday to save Ri'Chard's nephew, who's waiting for a bone marrow transplant, life.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep7
programme.desc: The End Of STR Laurie - Details that can risk the firm are revealed as part of a lawsuit. Jay finds that one of the firm employees is a white supremacist.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep8
programme.desc: The End Of Playing Games - While STR Laurie is investigated by the FBI, Liz and Ri'Chard attempt to take their clients. Meanwhile, Diane is forced to expose her PT-108 treatment.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep9
programme.desc: The End Of Democracy - While in Frank Landau's funeral, the partners try to talk Neil Gross to stay in the firm. Neil makes an interesting proposal to Diane. Jay asks Carmen for help.

programme.desc: The End Of Everything - The office must survive after being trapped by white supremacists.

programme.title: Hellboy

programme.desc: After his partner Tom Wynne and familyare killed by the infamousand elusive assassin Rogue (Jet Li), FBI agent Jack Crawford (Jason Statham) becomes obsessedwith revenge as his world unravels into a vortex of guilt and betrayal.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Nim is adventure author Alex Rovers number one fan and she lives on an isolated island with her scientist father. When her father is lost at sea and the island is being invaded, she convinces the agoraphobic and a germaphobe author to come and help.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: Raised by gorillas in a remote part of Africa, Tarzan must protect his jungle and Jane from greedy New York City businessmen who want to destroy his jungle home for profit in this stunning CGI-animated family adventure.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is the Middle East's best kept secret. It is a corner of Arabia of unparalleled beauty and unexpected landscapes. It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is the Middle East's best kept secret. It is a corner of Arabia of unparalleled beauty and unexpected landscapes. It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.title: Stanley Tucci: Searching for Italy S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Milan - Stanley visits Milan, the capital of Lombardy. He goes for aperitivo with a social media star and tries some of the Missoni family's favourite dishes: brasato, polenta and freshly foraged mushrooms.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep11
programme.desc: A tornado touchdown terrorises a school in Texas. The violent volcanic eruption in Tonga and a tsunami leaves residents trapped with nowhere to go and pilots battle extreme cross winds.

programme.title: Croc Watch with Steve Backshall S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Steve tries to find out if monster crocodiles can still thrive in the Reserve, and encounters five-metre-long Henry. But will he finally find the monster croc he's been searching for?

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Building Your Empire - In an unpredictable world our ancient powers must lay down the foundations of their societies to show their strength and protect their people. Who will build their way to glory?

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep2
programme.desc: Night Moves - Sue hunts caribou before a big storm approaches. At Calico Bluff Andy and Denise work on building a solar array. At Noorvik village Chip Hailstone performs safety checks on the ice.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Stroll through a public park that was once a New York rail line and a church that was transformed into a thriving community hub.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rebuilding An Empire - Over time, once-powerful animal empireslike the dinosaurshave been completely wiped from the planet. Meet the others once on the verge of disappearance who have survived, bounced back, and reclaimed their kingdoms.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice - Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Grasslands - Explore one of Earths most vital but overlooked habitats and learn how grasslands could slow climate change by soaking up more carbon than forests do. Meet key species, such as bison and pumas, that could restore this resource and heal our planet.

programme.title: Animals Like Us S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Lion Daycare - Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Battle to Save a Sea Lion - Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue centre, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bahamas Hollywood Wrecks - The Bahamas is known as the underwater movie capital of the world. Hollywood has been coming here for decades, making epic movies and TV shows in its crystal clear waters, leaving behind a host of cinematic shipwrecks.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ice - Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the seasons fury.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Fires of Pele - A Hawaiian volcano called Kilauea is one of the most active in the world. After years of constant lava activity, see how a sudden collapse of the crater floor and a massive eruption drains it of lava, making the volcano possible to explore.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue S1 Ep2

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades - Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Stormborn S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return of the Light - Experience the north Atlantics intense, brief summer with its animal residents. Follow Arctic fox cubs learning to hunt for survival, an otter pup going solo for the first time, a mate-seeking puffin, and tiny reindeer taking their first steps.

programme.title: Stormborn S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Children of the Storm - Welcome autumn to the north Atlantic, when its animals struggle to prepare for winter. Trace the grey seals mating frenzy and witness the horrific price one seal pup must pay. Then see reindeer undertake a perilous swim along their migration path.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Roatan - Roatan is known for its climate, white sandy beaches-and shipwrecks. From the decades-old Prince Albert to the newly-sunken Odyssey and Mr. Bud, explore artificial marine habitats at various stages of development.

programme.title: Chasing The Rains S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Praying for Rain - Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Weatherproof - Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Wild Castles S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Youngsters of the Desert - A young lion cub must survive as his family is torn apart, two adolescent leopard cubs must fend for themselves after they are abandoned, and a young adult blackbuck must risk life and limb as he tries to secure his first mating.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Rajan Monkey on a Mission - Rajan is the powerful alpha male monkey who sits at the head of an unusually large troop. He has done well to sustain this big tribe, but the future doesnt look good as the mouths to feed are growing while their home in the jungle is shrinking.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Temple Monkeys on the Run - In the ancient city of Jodhpur, the luxurious Temple Gardens are home to a troop of Hanuman Langurs who enjoy a peaceful life of bounty. But when a troop of young males attack they are forced to flee. Do they have what it takes to reclaim their home?

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Nagaina: Queen of Kings - In the hot forest of Southern India, a female King Cobra is on a mission: to find a mate, find food, and lay eggs before the monsoon arrives.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Path of The Matriarch - In southern India, the summer is a challenge for Asian elephants who must drink every day. As things dry up, Anura, the matriarch, leads her herd to a distant watering hole. But will she succeed in getting her 3-month-old grandson there in time?

programme.title: Kingdom Of The Tide S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Kingdom Of The Tide - Dive into the astounding, alien world that emerges whenever the tide goes out. Encounter curious creatures that have evolved to endure this zones extreme conditions, including an air-breathing fish and a predator that turns itself inside out to eat.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - Witness an explosive showdown between the all-female Hollywood pride and the Nomad brothers. Then check on Surabi, an MK female gored during a buffalo hunt, and Spotty, an MK cub whose fate hangs in the balance after hes separated from his pride.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Bonaire - Bonaire, a small island in the Southwest Caribbean, hosts one of the worlds most vibrant reef ecosystems-and a collection of stunning shipwrecks. Meet the tarpon, eagle rays and tiny sea creatures that call these relics home.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys Shipwreck Trail - The Florida Keys are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks! They form what is known as The Shipwreck Trail, a line-up of artificial reefs that provide the perfect shelter for fish-and a feeding ground for predators.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bahamas Hollywood Wrecks - The Bahamas is known as the underwater movie capital of the world. Hollywood has been coming here for decades, making epic movies and TV shows in its crystal clear waters, leaving behind a host of cinematic shipwrecks.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Reef Wrecks of Roatan - Roatan is known for its climate, white sandy beaches-and shipwrecks. From the decades-old Prince Albert to the newly-sunken Odyssey and Mr. Bud, explore artificial marine habitats at various stages of development.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lake Hunters - Sri Lankas lowlands are dotted with thousands of seemingly peaceful lakes, but dont be fooled, this is the realm of the mugger crocodile. Muggers are hunters from day one. Watch as these supreme predators compete with each other in the fierce heat.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Web Of Life - A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia. Follow a young male who has reached a turning point toward adulthood. In the rainforest, jungles teem with a variety of bizarre species of insects.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: From Cloud to Coast - Monsoons sweep into Sri Lankas mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the islands forests. Follow along from cloud forest to rainforest, mangrove to oceans edge. On this island the water cycle is creating special habitats for wildlife.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deep in the Heart - Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lake Hunters - Sri Lankas lowlands are dotted with thousands of seemingly peaceful lakes, but dont be fooled, this is the realm of the mugger crocodile. Muggers are hunters from day one. Watch as these supreme predators compete with each other in the fierce heat.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden Escapes - In New York we visit a hotel hidden airside amongst the hustle and bustle of the John F Kennedy airport - the TWA Hotel. In Finnish Lapland we venture to the deep snow-capped forest of the Urho Kkonen National Park.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show S32 Ep3
programme.desc: Graham's guests are Hollywood stars Zoe Saldana and Selena Gomez, comedy great Miranda Hart and the Doctor, Ncuti Gatwa.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S9 Ep9
programme.desc: It's Pastry Day and the second heat of bakers take on an invisible filling pie challenge and, in the Showstopper, the bakers pay homage to their idols.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S12 Ep3
programme.desc: Bread Week - The remaining bakers have a lot to prove as they put their own twist on a classic Italian focaccia, make a Greek-inspired snack and create ambitious designs in milk bread.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden Escapes - In New York we visit a hotel hidden airside amongst the hustle and bustle of the John F Kennedy airport - the TWA Hotel. In Finnish Lapland we venture to the deep snow-capped forest of the Urho Kkonen National Park.

programme.title: Cook Clever, Waste Less With Prue & Rupy S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Arora-Anand Family - Preeti and Sanjeev struggle with their hectic work lives and their children's multiple meal demands, causing spiralling food bills and waste. Can Prue and Rupy's plan tickle everyone's taste buds?

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S12 Ep3
programme.desc: Bread Week - The remaining bakers have a lot to prove as they put their own twist on a classic Italian focaccia, make a Greek-inspired snack and create ambitious designs in milk bread.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden Escapes - In New York we visit a hotel hidden airside amongst the hustle and bustle of the John F Kennedy airport - the TWA Hotel. In Finnish Lapland we venture to the deep snow-capped forest of the Urho Kkonen National Park.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Forest Sets the Flavour - Rachel heads into the woods in search of mushrooms. She also meets an ice-cream maker who inspires her to experiment with flavours, as she makes a lemon and dill parfait.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S12 Ep4
programme.desc: Dessert Week - The bakers put their twist on the classic pavlova and take on a toffee technical, before creating a delicate dessert wrapped in intricately patterned sponge for a splendid showstopper.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Dog lover Michelle, husband James and their two children need a life-changing declutter.

programme.title: George Clarke's Remarkable Renovations S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Barber Shop, Buckinghamshire - George meets Olivia and Rollo who are converting an old barbershop into a beautiful new home.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S6 Ep4
programme.desc: Six new teams produce perfect Prinsesstrtas and transform the humble bread and butter pudding. Whose fairy-tale ending will be cut short, and who will stay in the competition?

programme.title: Gordon, Gino and Fred's Road Trip S3 Ep4

programme.desc: Diamonds In The Rough - In Brooklyn, the buyers make a bid for unclaimed international freight.

programme.title: Baggage Battles S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Breaking The Bank - Buyers are in Atlanta, the freight capitol of the East Coast, to score.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown: After The Hunt S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ufos Over England: After The Hunt - Josh Gates, his crew and UFO expert James Fox offer behind-the-scenes insights into a mass UFO sighting in Zimbabwe.

programme.title: Big Beach Builds S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Captain's Paradise - A couple with deep roots in the historic town of Bethany Beach, Delaware, decides to buy a classic beach cottage a block away from the water.

programme.title: Big Beach Builds S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Big Family, Bigger Beach Home - Marnie maximizes space and preserves the integrity of a growing family's Bethany Beach dream home.

programme.title: The Ghost Town Terror S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Prey - The team splinters when Tim and Scott attempt to summon a demon despite Sarah and Sapphire's objections. The experiment exposes a new threat directly tied to Karen.

programme.title: Fright Club S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Ghost Streakers - Jack and the Ghost Brothers tackle a phantom football fan. Plus, special guest Montel Williams lends his signature real talk to couples affected by hauntings.

programme.title: Conjuring Kesha S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Terrifying Truth - Kesha and rapper GaTa check in for a night of terror at the Westerfeld House. Is illusionist Harry Houdini responsible for the electrifying paranormal activity?

programme.title: Hawaii Life S13 Ep9
programme.desc: From The Mountains To The Beaches On Maui - Young parents living on Maui are trading rainy weather for sunny beaches. They are ready to downsize to a condo as close to the beach as possible.

programme.title: Hawaii Life S13 Ep10
programme.desc: Feeling Centered On Maui - A free-spirited nurse from San Francisco is ready to make Maui her home. She can't wait to spend her time surfing and doing yoga on the beach.

programme.title: Free Ride S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Episode 1 - Faced with language barriers, exhaustion and foraging for wild food, will strangers help them or turn away?

programme.title: Alien Highway S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ufo Recovery - Chuck receives a map supposedly leading to a hidden cache of recovered materials from the Roswell incident.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep17
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Pawston - Tag and Scooch embark on a road trip to Chew York City to track down Kelly Korgi to ask her to perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party.\ When Kelly Korgi tells Tag she cant perform at Pawstons 100th birthday party, she and Scooch decide to create a Kelly Korgi replacement so that she doesnt break her promise to the town.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep18
programme.desc: Big Dog Job / The Case of the Slobbery - Tag tries to prove to Mom that shes a big dog by puppysitting Yip and Rhonda all day. All she has to do is get them to the playground, but the pups keep running off. \ When a giant, bone-shaped, roller coaster ride goes missing from the Amusement Bark, Detectives Tag and Scooch take on the case of the slobbery robbery.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep21
programme.desc: Weekend at Diamonds / Brancheption - Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep22
programme.desc: The Bunker List / The Interns - Branch bets Guy and Smidge that he can complete his Bunker List in one day/Satin and Chenille get the chance to intern for their idol Nova Swift

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep21
programme.desc: Monkey Planet - King Julien declares that lemurs will land on the moon and seeks help from a former astronaut: Stanislav, the Russian Space Monkey.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep22
programme.desc: True Bromance - When King Julien discovers that Maurice is moonlighting as adviser to another king, the two best friends break up.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep11
programme.desc: Mouse - Artephius tries to warn the town when an evil mouse charms his way into San Lorenzo but no one will listen to him.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep11
programme.desc: Salty and Sweet / Cruz Blues - Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep11
programme.desc: Chore Score / Dew Drop Swap - On Harpers first allowance day, the pets accidentally knock Harpers Piggy Bank over and lose one of her quarters that she was reserving to buy Nicholas an ice cream cone. Now the Dew Drops must scramble to replace it! / When the Dew Drops struggle to help their kids with tasks that are outside their usual fairy-bilities, they decide to swap kids for the day, but ultimately learn they re exactly where they need to be because they know their families so well!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep11
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Sam / Toy Driver - Its Tag and Scoochs first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tags old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep5
programme.desc: In Dragons We Trust - After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out whats really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep6
programme.desc: Alvin & the Outcasts - Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep7
programme.desc: How to Pick Your Dragon - Stoick wants to train his own dragon and enlists Hiccup to help him tame the most ferocious species yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep27
programme.desc: A Family Friend - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.desc: The English Opening - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep21
programme.desc: Packet Racket / Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. // After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep22
programme.desc: Smoovin On Up / The Great Shell Robbery - Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep21
programme.desc: Water - The Dinotrux crew builds an aqueduct to bring water back to the Flatirons during a drought, but D-Structs tries to sabotage their plan.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep22
programme.desc: Wind - A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep21
programme.desc: It's On Like Amazon! - Wally and Wenda go on a mission to return the borrowed Quick Bloom Key to its owner, an Amazon-dwelling wizard named Vinebeard. But Odlulu intercepts the key so she can use its magic for her lemonade stand. Using local trails, Wally and Wenda must track Odlulu through the jungle. They'll have to raft the Amazon and brave Odlulu's ""living"" plants to complete their mission

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep22
programme.desc: Mumbai Dance Party - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard visit a fellow Wizard in Mumbai to take part in a big Bollywood dance number. But when Odlulu uses the Follow-the-Leader Key to lead all the dancers away in order to dance with her, its up to the Wanderers to get the key AND the dancers back

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep12
programme.desc: Full House / Gift Express - Nicholas keeps stuffing oversized objects inside Edens fairy home. But it creates a BIG problem when Harpers family wants to visit grandma and the car keys are nowhere to be found! / When Harper gets sick, Marcus builds a pulley between their apartments to send Harper treats. But when Qwak, the chipmunk, breaks the pulley, the Dews must step in to keep the treat train running.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep12
programme.desc: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day - Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep10
programme.desc: One More Cup - Julien finds a bag of coffee beans in the Cove of Wonders and gets the entire lemur community hooked on caffeine.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep10
programme.desc: Sword - Dulcinea pulls a magical sword from a stone and becomes enchanted with heroic powers; Puss must help her learn how to control her newfound strength.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep10
programme.desc: Heather Report Part I - Hiccup and the gang befriend a beautiful stranger who has a dangerous secret.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep19
programme.desc: Stuff / Campout - When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didnt go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep20
programme.desc: Family Trip / Great Great Grandicorn - Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep19
programme.desc: Rodney the Hero / Club Shed - When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe hes a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesnt go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko / What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ians lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep19
programme.desc: Tag Team / Cattitude Adjustment - With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep20
programme.desc: Hocus Pocus / Furricane - When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep23
programme.desc: Three Trolls-keteers / The Helper - When a neighbor asks Guy for help to fight a monster, Guy mistakes it as an invite to act in his play/Smidge sets out to help Troll Village but creates disastrous results

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep24
programme.desc: Smidgician / DJ's Got Talent - Smidge tries to rescue the Trolls after thinking she has magical powers/ DJ Suki tries to impress her favorite niece CJ Suki

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep23
programme.desc: The King Who Would Be King - Fred the Giant Scorpion vows revenge after he reads an untrue story about himself in King Julien's new book.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep24
programme.desc: Are You There Frank? It's Me, King Julien - Frank the Sky God comes to the lemur kingdom to prove his existence and to demand the ultimate sacrifice: King Julien himself.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep12
programme.desc: Goblin - Cleevil, an orphan goblin, seeks refuge in San Lorenzo but, unbeknownst to Puss, he is in cahoots with the Duchess.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep12
programme.desc: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day - Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep12
programme.desc: Frank and Beans with Chili / Little Hound on the Prairie - Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tags ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep8
programme.desc: Portrait of Hiccup as a Buff Man - Believing his father is disappointed in him, Hiccup sets out on a dangerous treasure hunt.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep9
programme.desc: Dragon Flower - After a visit from Trader Johan, the dragons fall mysteriously ill and Hiccup and his friends must save them.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep10
programme.desc: Heather Report Part I - Hiccup and the gang befriend a beautiful stranger who has a dangerous secret.

programme.desc: Trading Up - Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep57
programme.desc: War of the Cheeks - Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep30
programme.desc: Tea Time Trouble - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep23
programme.desc: Lightning - When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep24
programme.desc: Slide - Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep23
programme.desc: Riddle Me This, Egypt - Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flamb. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.
