programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpas pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppas ball blows into the pond and Georges hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep162
programme.desc: Stuck! - Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep163
programme.desc: Switcheroo - When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Froga's strawberry plants.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn / Banana - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! // Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Bee's Knees Tea - When the Queen Bee comes to a Stump tea party, Chef's determined to put on a party fit for a queen.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep501
programme.desc: AJ to the Rescue - Blaze and AJ are racing through the jungle when Blaze gets trapped in super sticky mud! Now it's up to AJ and his new animal friends, to go on an epic adventure to save Blaze!

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep116
programme.desc: A Squirrely Situation / Sleepover Strategy - The hamsters vow to stop a mysterious thief from stealing their Num-Nugget deliveries. // During a sleepover, the hamsters try to reunite Harry with his beloved stuffed animal.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep925
programme.desc: Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks / Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys - When a mysterious storm drops hailstones that hatch into Baby Space Rocks, the Pups must find a way to keep them safe. // A 3-D printer leads to trouble when Eddie and Emmy make 3-D reproductions of themselves and play pranks all over Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep926
programme.desc: Charger Visits the Pups / Pups Save a Shiny Ride - Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe. // Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a "Shinest Ride Contest", so it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Pups and the Lighthouse Boogie - Mayor Goodway and Alex row out into the bay to get a closer look at a baby whale. But a storm blows the rowboat towards the sea.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep208
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Smoothie Shop / The Crew Builds A Dino Roof Party - Caf Carl opens up a smoothie shop on the boardwalk! But when the coaster causes coconut chaos, Rubble & Crew know just what to do. // Rubble & Crew work together to find a construction solution when Charger's bouncy birthday surprise needs a lift!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A School / The Crew Builds A Waterway - It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! / The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops and to keep Crunchy the beaver from taking all the water!

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep202
programme.desc: A Piata For Mami / Invisi-Swiper - Dora's family makes a piata for Mami's birthday, but it flies away! They have to get it back safe before Mami arrives. / Swiper swipes an invisibility blanket! Now Invisi-Swiper is swiping everything, and it's up to Dora and Boots to stop him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Dinner with Bentley - The Sharks turn their home into a fancy restaurant to impress a snobby dinner guest.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep307

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep212

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Meteor Madness - The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep214

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Flatpack - While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Andy and the Humboldt Penguins - Andy, Jen and Scout embark on a global adventure to the Peruvian desert to discover what is making a colony of Humboldt penguins so smelly. Along the way, they meet some sea lions.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Seeds - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how seeds play such an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep25
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed's Treasure Trove - Squawk takes us on a journey to find Sandy and Seaweed's top Swashbuckle moments.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Norrie's First Day - Norrie skips into the Clubhouse and greets her friends. As they greet her, they reminisce about when they first met.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep52
programme.desc: The Walking Badge - The Squirrels learn the many ways you can walk with the help of friends and a catchy song.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep51
programme.desc: The Action Hero Badge - The Squirrels learn about an action hero called Jet Rocket.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Petra, Jordan - Can the Go Jetters rescue the ancient city of Petra when Glitch causes in an earthquake?

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep50
programme.desc: The Paddy Fields of China - The Go Jetters swing into action when they discover that Glitch is using real landmarks for his crazy golf course.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep9
programme.desc: Thomas' Not So Lucky Day - It's Friday the 13th in Italy and Thomas tries to improve his luck by following Lorenzo and Beppe's advice on superstitions.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Origami Overload - John has a problem with the origami flamingos he has made and needs Sarah and Duck's help.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Shallot Circus - The Shallots have discovered acrobatics and are inspired to put on a show.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Hide & Sheep - It's a perfect day for the beach, if only the sheep would get out of Nelly and Nora's way!

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Dog Loves Anthology - Dog wants some high adventure and so he and Pug visit several different stories. Each time they arrive in their new story, they find that they are being chased by various characters.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Fun Factory - Monty ponders why fun activities must end, when he and Jimmy Jones are told by Stan their time playing at the park for the day is finished.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep1
programme.desc: It's Time to See a Rainbow - JoJo and Gran Gran get caught in the rain at the park and shelter under the bandstand. JoJo spots a rainbow and discovers that rainbows are only visible when it's rainy and sunny at the same time.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Omelette - Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Born Yesterday - Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mini Bluey - When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep17
programme.desc: The Dream Badge - The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep16
programme.desc: The Rainbow Badge - The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep15
programme.desc: The Ambition Badge - Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep49
programme.desc: The Nazca Lines, Peru - The Go Jetters race to protect ancient artwork in Peru, when Glitch erases the Nazca Lines.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep4

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep17
programme.desc: The Good, the Bad and the Prickly - Prickly Pear arrives in the Supermarket and tries to take over Evil Pea's freezer. Supertato discovers that Prickly Pear isn't mean at all and just needed some good friends.

programme.title: Arts Unveiled
programme.desc: How Chemnitz reinvents itself as Capital of Culture - Its both a challenge and a great opportunity for this East German city of 250,000 inhabitants. Chemnitz, named "Karl Marx City" when it was part of the GDR, was once a flourishing industrial center. But since the Berlin Wall fell, it has repeatedly made headlines because of right-wing extremist protests along with racist and xenophobic attacks.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep608
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Unbreakable: Mullarkey x Pearson, Fighter Focus: Jack Jenkins, On Point: Aussie MMA, Day One: Jack Della Maddalena - Delve into the unbreakable bond between UFC veteran Ross Pearson and Australias up and coming lightweight Jamie Mullarkey. Jack Phar Jenkins details his aggressive style in his run up to the UFC to prove hes anything but a One Trick Pony. UFCs top Australian prospects and champions discuss the booming impact Aussie MMA has had in the UFC octagon. UFC welterweight Jack Della Maddalena looks back on his shot at the UFC on DWCS in Day One.

programme.title: UFC 309: Jones vs. Miocic
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC returns to the Worlds Most Famous Arena on Saturday, November 17, as Jon Jones defends his heavyweight title against Stipe Miocic in the highly anticipated main event of UFC 309 at Madison Square Garden in New York City. One of the greatest light heavyweights of all-time, Jones is on his way to repeating that success in his new weight class, but to cement that claim, he has to get by the man considered to be the best heavyweight to ever do it in Clevelands Miocic. Plus, a rematch fans have been waiting for comes to fruition in the Big Apple, as former lightweight champion Charles Oliveira faces off with Iron Michael Chandler.
